LanguageData.Jackalope.label: 鹿角兔
LanguageData.Jackalope.description: A bizarre type of rabbit, seemingly genetically altered to grow surprisingly sharp antlers from its skull。
LanguageData.Jackalope.tools.0.label: antlers
LanguageData.Jackalope.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.SnowJackalope.label: 雪鹿角兔
LanguageData.SnowJackalope.description: A bizarre type of rabbit, seemingly genetically altered to grow surprisingly sharp antlers from its skull.\n\nSnow jackalopes are fit to survive incredibly cold temperatures with their plush white fur。
LanguageData.SnowJackalope.tools.0.label: antlers
LanguageData.SnowJackalope.tools.2.label: head
